item.title: Compiler Notes
item.description: Introduction to Compiler Three types of translater Compiler => used in High level language Interpreter => used in High level language Assembler => used in Assembly language Why study compiler design not interpreter compilation: translate source code into object code as whole It create object file execution is fast Program is not required to translate each time to run Error diagonosis is poor Most HLL uses compiler Interpreter:
